text: Tania Tinoco (August 2, 1963 – May 21, 2022) was an Ecuadorian journalist, author, television producer, director, television and radio presenter, reporter, interviewer, and opinion leader. For more than 30 years, she has been known as the host of the Ecuavisa nightly newscast, Televistazo. Tinoco was born in Machala, Ecuador. Tinoco died on May 21, 2022 at a hospital in Cleveland, Ohio from cardiopulmonary arrest caused by arrhythmia, aged 58.Falleció la periodista Tania Tinoco ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Ecuadorian journalists Category:Television producers Category:Television directors Category:Television presenters Category:Political commentators Category:Deaths from cardiopulmonary arrest Category:Deaths from cardiac arrhythmia Category:Ecuadorian television personalities
title: Tania Tinoco
